meanings.sent1: In France, students attend lycees to continue their education after primary school.
meanings.sent2: The lycees in France offer a wide range of academic subjects for students to study.
meanings.sent3: The lycees in France must be filled with students eager to learn and grow.
meanings.sent4: The lycees stand as beacons of knowledge and opportunity for young minds.
meanings.sent5: Walking through the halls of the lycees, one can feel the excitement of learning in the air.
